ps2.6:1.2.pli: ekaṃ samayaṃ bhagavā bārāṇasiyaṃ viharati isipatane migadāye.

ps2.6:1.3.pli: Tatra kho bhagavā pañcavaggiye bhikkhū āmantesi—

ps2.6:2.3.pli: Yo cāyaṃ kāmesu kāmasukhallikānuyogo hīno gammo pothujjaniko anariyo anatthasaṃhito;

ps2.6:2.4.pli: yo cāyaṃ attakilamathānuyogo dukkho anariyo anatthasaṃhito.

ps2.6:2.5.pli: Ete kho, bhikkhave, ubho ante anupagamma majjhimā paṭipadā tathāgatena abhisambuddhā cakkhukaraṇī ñāṇakaraṇī upasamāya abhiññāya sambodhāya nibbānāya saṃvattati.

ps2.6:3.1.pli: Katamā ca sā, bhikkhave, majjhimā paṭipadā tathāgatena abhisambuddhā cakkhukaraṇī ñāṇakaraṇī upasamāya abhiññāya sambodhāya nibbānāya saṃvattati?

ps2.6:3.4.pli: Ayaṃ kho sā, bhikkhave, majjhimā paṭipadā tathāgatena abhisambuddhā cakkhukaraṇī ñāṇakaraṇī upasamāya abhiññāya sambodhāya nibbānāya saṃvattati.

ps2.6:4.1.pli: Idaṃ kho pana, bhikkhave, dukkhaṃ ariyasaccaṃ.

ps2.6:4.2.pli: Jātipi dukkhā, jarāpi dukkhā, byādhipi dukkho, maraṇampi dukkhaṃ, appiyehi sampayogo dukkho, piyehi vippayogo dukkho, yampicchaṃ na labhati tampi dukkhaṃ;

ps2.6:4.4.pli: Idaṃ kho pana, bhikkhave, dukkhasamudayaṃ ariyasaccaṃ—

ps2.6:4.5.pli: yāyaṃ taṇhā ponobhavikā nandirāgasahagatā tatratatrābhinandinī, seyyathidaṃ—

ps2.6:4.7.pli: Idaṃ kho pana, bhikkhave, dukkhanirodhaṃ ariyasaccaṃ—

ps2.6:4.8.pli: yo tassāyeva taṇhāya asesavirāganirodho cāgo paṭinissaggo mutti anālayo.

ps2.6:4.9.pli: Idaṃ kho pana, bhikkhave, dukkhanirodhagāminī paṭipadā ariyasaccaṃ—

ps2.6:5.1.pli: ‘Idaṃ dukkhaṃ ariyasaccan’ti me, bhikkhave, pubbe ananussutesu dhammesu cakkhuṃ udapādi, ñāṇaṃ udapādi, paññā udapādi, vijjā udapādi, āloko udapādi.

ps2.6:5.2.pli: ‘Taṃ kho panidaṃ dukkhaṃ ariyasaccaṃ pariññeyyan’ti me, bhikkhave …pe…

ps2.6:5.3.pli: pariññātanti me, bhikkhave, pubbe ananussutesu dhammesu cakkhuṃ udapādi, ñāṇaṃ udapādi, paññā udapādi, vijjā udapādi, āloko udapādi.

ps2.6:6.1.pli: ‘Idaṃ dukkhasamudayaṃ ariyasaccan’ti me, bhikkhave, pubbe ananussutesu dhammesu cakkhuṃ udapādi, ñāṇaṃ udapādi, paññā udapādi, vijjā udapādi, āloko udapādi.

ps2.6:6.2.pli: ‘Taṃ kho panidaṃ dukkhasamudayaṃ ariyasaccaṃ pahātabban’ti me, bhikkhave …pe…

ps2.6:6.3.pli: pahīnanti me, bhikkhave, pubbe ananussutesu dhammesu cakkhuṃ udapādi, ñāṇaṃ udapādi, paññā udapādi, vijjā udapādi, āloko udapādi.

ps2.6:7.1.pli: ‘Idaṃ dukkhanirodhaṃ ariyasaccan’ti me, bhikkhave, pubbe ananussutesu dhammesu cakkhuṃ udapādi, ñāṇaṃ udapādi, paññā udapādi, vijjā udapādi, āloko udapādi.

ps2.6:8.2.pli: ‘Taṃ kho panidaṃ dukkhanirodhagāminī paṭipadā ariyasaccaṃ bhāvetabban’ti me, bhikkhave …pe…

ps2.6:9.1.pli: Yāvakīvañca me, bhikkhave, imesu catūsu ariyasaccesu evaṃ tiparivaṭṭaṃ dvādasākāraṃ yathābhūtaṃ ñāṇadassanaṃ na suvisuddhaṃ ahosi, neva tāvāhaṃ, bhikkhave, sadevake loke samārake sabrahmake sassamaṇabrāhmaṇiyā pajāya sadevamanussāya ‘anuttaraṃ sammāsambodhiṃ abhisambuddho’ti paccaññāsiṃ.

ps2.6:10.1.pli: Yato ca kho me, bhikkhave, imesu catūsu ariyasaccesu evaṃ tiparivaṭṭaṃ dvādasākāraṃ yathābhūtaṃ ñāṇadassanaṃ suvisuddhaṃ ahosi, athāhaṃ, bhikkhave, sadevake loke samārake sabrahmake sassamaṇabrāhmaṇiyā pajāya sadevamanussāya ‘anuttaraṃ sammāsambodhiṃ abhisambuddho’ti paccaññāsiṃ.

ps2.6:10.3.pli: ‘akuppā me vimutti, ayamantimā jāti, natthi dāni punabbhavo’”ti.

ps2.6:11.2.pli: Attamanā pañcavaggiyā bhikkhū bhagavato bhāsitaṃ abhinandunti.

ps2.6:12.1.pli: Imasmiñca pana veyyākaraṇasmiṃ bhaññamāne āyasmato koṇḍaññassa virajaṃ vītamalaṃ dhammacakkhuṃ udapādi—

ps2.6:13.1.pli: Pavattite ca pana bhagavatā dhammacakke bhummā devā saddamanussāvesuṃ—

ps2.6:13.2.pli: “etaṃ bhagavatā bārāṇasiyaṃ isipatane migadāye anuttaraṃ dhammacakkaṃ pavattitaṃ appaṭivattiyaṃ samaṇena vā brāhmaṇena vā devena vā mārena vā brahmunā vā kenaci vā lokasmin”ti.

ps2.6:13.3.pli: Bhummānaṃ devānaṃ saddaṃ sutvā cātumahārājikā devā saddamanussāvesuṃ …

ps2.6:13.4.pli: cātumahārājikānaṃ devānaṃ saddaṃ sutvā tāvatiṃsā devā …pe…

ps2.6:13.10.pli: “etaṃ bhagavatā bārāṇasiyaṃ isipatane migadāye anuttaraṃ dhammacakkaṃ pavattitaṃ appaṭivattiyaṃ samaṇena vā brāhmaṇena vā devena vā mārena vā brahmunā vā kenaci vā lokasmin”ti.

ps2.6:14.1.pli: Itiha tena khaṇena tena layena tena muhuttena yāva brahmalokā saddo abbhuggacchi.

ps2.6:14.2.pli: Ayañca dasasahassī lokadhātu saṅkampi sampakampi sampavedhi, appamāṇo ca uḷāro obhāso loke pāturahosi atikkamma devānaṃ devānubhāvanti.

ps2.6:15.1.pli: Atha kho bhagavā imaṃ udānaṃ udānesi—

ps2.6:15.4.pli: Iti hidaṃ āyasmato koṇḍaññassa “aññāsikoṇḍañño”tveva nāmaṃ ahosi.

ps2.6:55.2.pli: Imāni vīsati ñāṇāni paṭibhānapaṭisambhidāya ārammaṇā ceva honti gocarā ca.

ps2.6:55.3.pli: Ye tassā ārammaṇā te tassā gocarā.

ps2.6:55.4.pli: Ye tassā gocarā te tassā ārammaṇā.

ps2.6:56.1.pli: Chandasamādhipadhānasaṅkhārasamannāgate iddhipāde pannarasa dhammā, pannarasa atthā, tiṃsa niruttiyo, saṭṭhi ñāṇāni.

ps2.6:57.3.pli: ayaṃ vīmaṃsāsamādhipadhānasaṅkhārasamannāgato iddhipādoti pubbe ananussutesu dhammesu cakkhuṃ udapādi …pe…

ps2.6:57.5.pli: so kho panāyaṃ vīmaṃsāsamādhipadhānasaṅkhārasamannāgato iddhipādo bhāvetabboti …pe…

ps2.6:57.6.pli: bhāvitoti pubbe ananussutesu dhammesu cakkhuṃ udapādi …pe…

ps2.6:58.1.pli: Vīmaṃsāsamādhipadhānasaṅkhārasamannāgate iddhipāde pannarasa dhammā, pannarasa atthā, tiṃsa niruttiyo, saṭṭhi ñāṇāni.

ps2.6:59.1.pli: Catūsu iddhipādesu saṭṭhi dhammā, saṭṭhi atthā, vīsatisataniruttiyo, cattālīsañca dve ca ñāṇasatāni.

ps2.6:60.1.pli: “‘Samudayo samudayo’ti kho, bhikkhave, vipassissa bodhisattassa pubbe ananussutesu dhammesu cakkhuṃ udapādi …pe…

ps2.6:60.3.pli: ‘Nirodho nirodho’ti kho, bhikkhave, vipassissa bodhisattassa pubbe ananussutesu dhammesu cakkhuṃ udapādi …pe…

ps2.6:60.5.pli: Vipassissa bodhisattassa veyyākaraṇe dasa dhammā, dasa atthā, vīsati niruttiyo, cattālīsaṃ ñāṇāni.

ps2.6:61.5.pli: kassapassa bodhisattassa pubbe ananussutesu dhammesu cakkhuṃ udapādi …pe…

ps2.6:61.7.pli: ‘Nirodho nirodho’ti kho, bhikkhave, kassapassa bodhisattassa pubbe ananussutesu dhammesu cakkhuṃ udapādi …pe…

ps2.6:61.9.pli: Kassapassa bodhisattassa veyyākaraṇe dasa dhammā, dasa atthā, vīsati niruttiyo, cattālīsaṃ ñāṇāni.

ps2.6:62.1.pli: “‘Samudayo samudayo’ti kho, bhikkhave, gotamassa bodhisattassa pubbe ananussutesu dhammesu cakkhuṃ udapādi …pe…

ps2.6:62.3.pli: ‘Nirodho nirodho’ti kho, bhikkhave, gotamassa bodhisattassa pubbe ananussutesu dhammesu cakkhuṃ udapādi …pe…

ps2.6:62.5.pli: Gotamassa bodhisattassa veyyākaraṇe dasa dhammā, dasa atthā, vīsati niruttiyo, cattālīsaṃ ñāṇāni.

ps2.6:63.1.pli: Sattannaṃ bodhisattānaṃ sattasu veyyākaraṇesu sattati dhammā, sattati atthā, cattālīsasataṃ niruttiyo, asīti ca dve ca ñāṇasatāni.

ps2.6:64.1.pli: “‘Yāvatā abhiññāya abhiññaṭṭho ñāto diṭṭho vidito sacchikato phassito paññāya.

ps2.6:64.3.pli: cakkhuṃ udapādi, ñāṇaṃ udapādi, paññā udapādi, vijjā udapādi, āloko udapādi”.

ps2.6:64.4.pli: Abhiññāya abhiññaṭṭhe pañcavīsati dhammā, pañcavīsati atthā, paññāsaṃ niruttiyo, sataṃ ñāṇāni.

ps2.6:65.4.pli: yāvatā sacchikiriyāya sacchikiriyaṭṭho ñāto diṭṭho vidito sacchikato phassito paññāya.

ps2.6:65.6.pli: cakkhuṃ udapādi, ñāṇaṃ udapādi, paññā udapādi, vijjā udapādi, āloko udapādi”.

ps2.6:65.7.pli: Sacchikiriyāya sacchikiriyaṭṭhe pañcavīsati dhammā, pañcavīsati atthā, paññāsaṃ niruttiyo, sataṃ ñāṇāni.

ps2.6:66.1.pli: Abhiññāya abhiññaṭṭhe, pariññāya pariññaṭṭhe, pahānāya pahānaṭṭhe, bhāvanāya bhāvanaṭṭhe, sacchikiriyāya sacchikiriyaṭṭhe pañcavīsasataṃ dhammā, pañcavīsasataṃ atthā, aḍḍhateyyāni niruttisatāni, pañca ñāṇasatāni.

ps2.6:67.1.pli: “‘Yāvatā khandhānaṃ khandhaṭṭho, ñāto diṭṭho vidito sacchikato phassito paññāya.

ps2.6:67.3.pli: cakkhuṃ udapādi, ñāṇaṃ udapādi, paññā udapādi, vijjā udapādi, āloko udapādi”.

ps2.6:67.4.pli: Khandhānaṃ khandhaṭṭhe pañcavīsati dhammā, pañcavīsati atthā, paññāsaṃ niruttiyo, sataṃ ñāṇāni.

ps2.6:68.4.pli: yāvatā asaṅkhatassa asaṅkhataṭṭho ñāto diṭṭho vidito sacchikato phassito paññāya.

ps2.6:68.8.pli: Asaṅkhatassa asaṅkhataṭṭhe pañcavīsati dhammā, pañcavīsati atthā, paññāsaṃ niruttiyo, sataṃ ñāṇāni.

ps2.6:69.1.pli: Khandhānaṃ khandhaṭṭhe, dhātūnaṃ dhātuṭṭhe, āyatanānaṃ āyatanaṭṭhe saṅkhatānaṃ saṅkhataṭṭhe, asaṅkhatassa asaṅkhataṭṭhe pañcavīsatisataṃ dhammā, pañcavīsatisataṃ atthā, aḍḍhateyyāni niruttisatāni, pañca ñāṇasatāni.

ps2.6:70.1.pli: “‘Yāvatā dukkhassa dukkhaṭṭho, ñāto diṭṭho vidito sacchikato phassito paññāya.

ps2.6:70.3.pli: cakkhuṃ udapādi, ñāṇaṃ udapādi, paññā udapādi, vijjā udapādi, āloko udapādi”.

ps2.6:70.4.pli: Dukkhassa dukkhaṭṭhe pañcavīsati dhammā, pañcavīsati atthā, paññāsaṃ niruttiyo, sataṃ ñāṇāni.

ps2.6:71.3.pli: yāvatā maggassa maggaṭṭho ñāto diṭṭho vidito sacchikato phassito paññāya.

ps2.6:71.7.pli: Maggassa maggaṭṭhe pañcavīsati dhammā, pañcavīsati atthā, paññāsaṃ niruttiyo, sataṃ ñāṇāni.

ps2.6:72.1.pli: Catūsu ariyasaccesu sataṃ dhammā, sataṃ atthā, dve niruttisatāni, cattāri ñāṇasatāni.

ps2.6:73.1.pli: “‘Yāvatā atthapaṭisambhidāya atthapaṭisambhidaṭṭho, ñāto diṭṭho vidito sacchikato phassito paññāya.

ps2.6:73.5.pli: Atthapaṭisambhidāya atthapaṭisambhidaṭṭhe pañcavīsati dhammā, pañcavīsati atthā, paññāsaṃ niruttiyo, sataṃ ñāṇāni.

ps2.6:74.3.pli: yāvatā paṭibhānapaṭisambhidāya paṭibhānapaṭisambhidaṭṭho, ñāto diṭṭho vidito sacchikato phassito paññāya.

ps2.6:74.7.pli: Paṭibhānapaṭisambhidaṭṭhe pañcavīsati dhammā, pañcavīsati atthā, paññāsaṃ niruttiyo, sataṃ ñāṇāni.

ps2.6:75.1.pli: Catūsu paṭisambhidāsu sataṃ dhammā, sataṃ atthā, dve niruttisatāni, cattāri ñāṇasatāni.

ps2.6:76.1.pli: “‘Yāvatā indriyaparopariyattañāṇaṃ, ñātaṃ diṭṭhaṃ viditaṃ sacchikataṃ phassitaṃ paññāya.

ps2.6:76.5.pli: Indriyaparopariyattañāṇe pañcavīsati dhammā, pañcavīsati atthā, paññāsaṃ niruttiyo, sataṃ ñāṇāni.

ps2.6:77.5.pli: yāvatā anāvaraṇaṃ ñāṇaṃ, ñātaṃ diṭṭhaṃ viditaṃ sacchikataṃ phassitaṃ paññāya.

ps2.6:77.7.pli: cakkhuṃ udapādi, ñāṇaṃ udapādi, paññā udapādi, vijjā udapādi, āloko udapādi”.

ps2.6:77.8.pli: Anāvaraṇe ñāṇe pañcavīsati dhammā, pañcavīsati atthā, paññāsaṃ niruttiyo, sataṃ ñāṇāni.

ps2.6:78.1.pli: Chasu buddhadhammesu diyaḍḍhasataṃ dhammā, diyaḍḍhasataṃ atthā, tīṇi niruttisatāni, cha ñāṇasatāni.

ps2.6:79.1.pli: Paṭisambhidādhikaraṇe aḍḍhanavadhammasatāni, aḍḍhanavaatthasatāni, niruttisahassañca satta ca niruttisatāni, tīṇi ca ñāṇasahassāni, cattāri ca ñāṇasatānīti.
